verses.verse: In the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes<s%>, which was made <S%H4427>king<s%> over the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>;

In the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H995>understood<s%> by <S%H5612>books<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%>, whereof the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, that he would <S%H4390>accomplish<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

¶ And I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H1245>seek<s%> by <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8469>supplications<s%>, with <S%H6685>fasting<s%>, and <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H665>ashes<s%>:

And I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, and made my <S%H3034>confession<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H577>O<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%>, the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to them that <S%H157>love<s%> him, and to them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>;

We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and have committed <S%H5753>iniquity<s%>, and have done <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>, and have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%>, even by <S%H5493>departing<s%> from thy <S%H4687>precepts<s%> and from thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>:

Neither have we <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, which <S%H1696>spake<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to our <S%H4428>kings<s%>, our <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> belongeth unto thee, but unto us <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>faces<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>; to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that are <S%H7138>near<s%>, and that are far <S%H7350>off<s%>, through all the <S%H776>countries<s%> whither thou hast <S%H5080>driven<s%> them, because of their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> that they have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against thee.

O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, to us belongeth <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face<s%>, to our <S%H4428>kings<s%>, to our <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and to our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, because we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee.
To the <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> belong <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and <S%H5547>forgivenesses<s%>, though we have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him;

Neither have we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>laws<s%>, which he <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

Yea, all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>, even by <S%H5493>departing<s%>, that they might not <S%H8085>obey<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>; therefore the <S%H423>curse<s%> is <S%H5413>poured<s%> upon us, and the <S%H7621>oath<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, because we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against him.

And he hath <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> against us, and against our <S%H8199>judges<s%> that <S%H8199>judged<s%> us, by <S%H935>bringing<s%> upon us a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: for under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%> hath not been <S%H6213>done<s%> as hath been <S%H6213>done<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

As it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> upon us: yet made we not our <S%H2470>prayer<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, that we might <S%H7725>turn<s%> from our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, and <S%H7919>understand<s%> thy <S%H571>truth<s%>.

Therefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8245>watched<s%> upon the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it upon us: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in all his <S%H4639>works<s%> which he <S%H6213>doeth<s%>: for we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not his <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

And now, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, that hast <S%H3318>brought<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>gotten<s%> thee <S%H8034>renown<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>; we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, we have done <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>.

¶ O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, according to all thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, I beseech thee, let thine <S%H639>anger<s%> and thy <S%H2534>fury<s%> be turned <S%H7725>away<s%> from thy <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: because for our <S%H2399>sins<s%>, and for the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to all that are <S%H5439>about<s%> us.

Now therefore, O our <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and his <S%H8469>supplications<s%>, and cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon thy <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> that is <S%H8076>desolate<s%>, for the <S%H136>Lord's<s%> sake.

O my <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>; <S%H6491>open<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> our <S%H8074>desolations<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: for we do not <S%H5307>present<s%> our <S%H8469>supplications<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee for our <S%H6666>righteousnesses<s%>, but for thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%>.

O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%>; O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H5545>forgive<s%>; O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H7181>hearken<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%>; <S%H309>defer<s%> <S%H408>not<s%>, for thine own sake, O my <S%H430>God<s%>: for thy <S%H5892>city<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

¶ And whiles I was <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, and <S%H6419>praying<s%>, and <S%H3034>confessing<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5307>presenting<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>;

Yea, whiles I was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, even the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1403>Gabriel<s%>, whom I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning<s%>, being caused to <S%H3286>fly<s%> <S%H3288>swiftly<s%>, <S%H5060>touched<s%> me about the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>oblation<s%>.

And he <S%H995>informed<s%> me, and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, I am now come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to give thee <S%H7919>skill<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>.

At the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of thy <S%H8469>supplications<s%> the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and I am <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5046>shew<s%> thee; for thou art greatly <S%H2532>beloved<s%>: therefore <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>, and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H4758>vision<s%>.

<S%H7657>Seventy<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> are <S%H2852>determined<s%> upon thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and upon thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, to <S%H3607>finish<s%> the <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, and to make an <S%H8552%H2856>end<s%> of <S%H2403>sins<s%>, and to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and to bring <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and to seal <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%> and <S%H5030>prophecy<s%>, and to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>Holy<s%>.

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore and <S%H7919>understand<s%>, that from the going <S%H4161>forth<s%> of the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> and to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H4899>Messiah<s%> the <S%H5057>Prince<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%>: the <S%H7339>street<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and the <S%H2742>wall<s%>, even in <S%H6695>troublous<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> shall <S%H4899>Messiah<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, but not for himself: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H5057>prince<s%> that shall <S%H935>come<s%> shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>; and the <S%H7093>end<s%> thereof shall be with a <S%H7858>flood<s%>, and unto the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H8074>desolations<s%> are <S%H2782>determined<s%>.

And he shall <S%H1396>confirm<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7620>week<s%>: and in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of the <S%H7620>week<s%> he shall cause the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and the <S%H4503>oblation<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, and for the <S%H3671>overspreading<s%> of <S%H8251>abominations<s%> he shall make it <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, even until the <S%H3617>consummation<s%>, and that <S%H2782>determined<s%> shall be <S%H5413>poured<s%> upon the <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.
